item.title: Season 2 Compilation + Downloads
item.description:
As promised, here is the entirety of season 2 in one! It covers most SCPs from SCP-100 to SCP-149.

It is too long to upload as a podcast episode, so it is available on Youtube. In case you want to save bandwidth or listen offline, several audio files are available below.

Thank you to all my listeners, patrons, donors, who made it possible. üñ§

Youtube

Chapter markings have been set, and timestamps are in the description.

Download

Full list here (Github Releases)

Text file of timestamps

MP3 320kbps – high quality, large file (652 MB)

MP3 192kbps – high quality, medium file (393 MB)

MP3 128kbps – good quality, medium file (264 MB)

Check integrity

SHA256 hashes and GPG signature available.

Thank You

Thanks for listening. Bonuses will start next week, the expected lineup is listed here. I appreciate you all, happy holidays!

Follow on Social Media + Where to listen

Discord

Support the podcast

Suggest an episode
